body:
Hello guys, so as you probably know I detest the name Evocal as of now. So I'm going to change it to something different once 1.8 is here. 
Thing is, some of my best friends are also going to change names, and I came up with a nice, but hard idea... I suggested we all had some sort of similar name, so we could all be seen as a team or something of the kind.

Some examples of this are:
Cezbla, Fezbla, Sezbla, rezbla: They all end in 'ezbla' and the starting letter changes in the four usernames. I mean it's quite obvious they share a strong bond, right?

ParaPenguin and ParaPhoenix: One of my favorite combos. Para is a short, very nice and easy to remember prefix, something really pleasant to hear. Add 'Phoenix' and 'Penguin' to it, even more amazing! Their names match in so many ways it's almost impossible not to tell they are best friends or something.
Prefix is short, starts with P and has 4 letters.
Suffix is perfect size, starts with P (matches with prefix!), both of the suffixes are creatures, both of them have 7 letters (Phoenix and Penguin), and the aftermath is just pure awesomeness.

I've tried, over and over again, however I don't seem to have any good ideas for this...
Do you guys know of anything we could use to identify ourselves (me & friends) as a nice group?
I'm searching for simple stuff, not xXxSUperEPiCaWeSOME775 and XxXsuPERepIcAwEsome577.
Something as simple as the examples I stated above, but something that is actually original, I don't want to copy anything from anyone...
Thanks for you time and help!
